practice_phrases.target: I was a little tired yesterday
I am a little tired this morning
I was a little tired after I finished

practice_phrases.known: 我有点累因为我在学习
practice_phrases.target: I am a little tired because I was learning

practice_phrases.known: 我有点累但是我想和你说话
practice_phrases.target: I am a little tired but I want to speak with you

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上有点累但是我现在准备好了
practice_phrases.target: I was a little tired this morning but I am ready now

practice_phrases.known: 我有点累因为我努力学习一些有用的东西
practice_phrases.target: I am a little tired because I was trying to learn something useful

practice_phrases.known: 我想和你说话但是我完成后有点累
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you but I was a little tired after I finished
